瘦.definition: thin; to lose weight; (of clothing) tight; (of meat) lean; (of land) unproductive

瘦死的駱駝比馬大.pinyin: shòu sǐ de luò tuó bǐ mǎ dà
瘦死的駱駝比馬大.definition: lit. even a scrawny camel is bigger than a horse (idiom); fig. even after suffering a loss, a rich person is still better off than ordinary people; a cultured person may come down in the world, but he is still superior to the common people

瘦身.definition: to lose weight (intentionally); to slim down; (Tw) to downsize (a business)
